description:
B.E.C.E – 2015 INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLO GY 1

B.E.C.E –  2015  INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION TECHNOLO GY 1 is a 40 objective questions and optional answer buttons that will enable you to choose correct answers. This is a final year intermediate questions that can help the user answer any ICT questions easily in any examination.
